channel.title: WTF Cant Find FILE?
channel.description:
This is the code that states where the file is located on my computer:
FileReader fr = new FileReader("Users/docent/desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg");
Now I checked and that is exactly the directory needed. When I run the server however this pops up:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: Users/docent/Desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg (No such file or directory) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at palidino76.rs2.world.geLoader.loadprices(geLoader.java:23) at palidino76.rs2.world.geLoader.<init>(geLoader.java:16) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.<clinit>(Engine.java:35) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:86)

item.title: WTF Cant Find FILE?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

I guess no because he deleted all of your files so now its not going to look for something.

Read full topic

He just deleted the class content so now your compiler wont search for that address

item.title: WTF Cant Find FILE?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:8, topic:527912”][quote author=Docent link=topic=646663.msg4348849#msg4348849 date=1376338222]

post the method for the grandExhange.cfg

Heres the entire class, it isnt big

[code=java]package palidino76.rs2.world;

import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class geLoader {
public int maxListedItems = 16000;
public geList[] geList = new geList[maxListedItems];
public String sell = “”;
public String buy = “”;
public geLoader() {
System.out.println("[Ge Prices loaded]");
try {
loadprices();
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}
public void loadprices() throws IOException {
String line = “”;
FileReader fr = new FileReader(“C:/Users/milaud/Desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg”);
BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(fr);
String s= “”;
while ((s = br.readLine()) != null) {
String Read[] = s.split("\t");
if(Read[0].contains("["))
{
break;
}
String itemId = Read[0].substring(7);
if (Read[1].contains(“m”)) {
sell = Read[1].replace(“m”, “00000”);
} else if (Read[1].contains(“k”)) {
sell = Read[1].replace(“k”, “00”);
} else {
sell = Read[1].replace(",", “”);
}
if (Read[2].contains(“m”)) {
buy = Read[2].replace(“m”, “00000”);
} else if (Read[2].contains(“k”)) {
buy = Read[2].replace(“k”, “00”);
} else {
buy = Read[2].replace(",", “”);
}
sell = sell.replace(".", “”).replace(" “, “”);
buy = buy.replace(”.", “”).replace(" ", “”);

        if (sell.equals("null")) {
            sell = "0";
        }
        if (buy.equals("null")) {
            buy = "0";
        }
        newItemList(Integer.parseInt(itemId), Integer.parseInt(sell), Integer.parseInt(buy));
         }
    
}

private void newItemList(int ItemId, int buy, int sell) {
    if (ItemId > maxListedItems) {
        Misc.println("maxListedItems to low.");
        return;
    }
    geList[ItemId] = new geList(ItemId, buy, sell);
}

}[/code]
[/quote]

Users/docent/desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg"

“C:/Users/milaud/Desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg”

i’m very confused… at the user names///[/quote]

lol that was the one the thing came with, all I did was change it to Docent

Read full topic

Heres the entire class, it isnt big

[code=java]package palidino76.rs2.world;

import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class geLoader {
public int maxListedItems = 16000;

public String buy = “”;

try {
loadprices();
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}
public void loadprices() throws IOException {
String line = “”;
FileReader fr = new FileReader(“C:/Users/milaud/Desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg”);
BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(fr);
String s= “”;
while ((s = br.readLine()) != null) {
String Read[] = s.split("\t");
if(Read[0].contains("["))
{
break;
}
String itemId = Read[0].substring(7);
if (Read[1].contains(“m”)) {
sell = Read[1].replace(“m”, “00000”);
} else if (Read[1].contains(“k”)) {
sell = Read[1].replace(“k”, “00”);
} else {
sell = Read[1].replace(",", “”);
}
if (Read[2].contains(“m”)) {
buy = Read[2].replace(“m”, “00000”);
} else if (Read[2].contains(“k”)) {
buy = Read[2].replace(“k”, “00”);
} else {
buy = Read[2].replace(",", “”);
}
sell = sell.replace(".", “”).replace(" “, “”);
buy = buy.replace(”.", “”).replace(" ", “”);

        if (sell.equals("null")) {
            sell = "0";
        }
        if (buy.equals("null")) {
            buy = "0";
        }
        newItemList(Integer.parseInt(itemId), Integer.parseInt(sell), Integer.parseInt(buy));
         }
    
}

private void newItemList(int ItemId, int buy, int sell) {
    if (ItemId > maxListedItems) {
        Misc.println("maxListedItems to low.");
        return;
    }
    geList[ItemId] = new geList(ItemId, buy, sell);
}

}[/code][/quote]

Users/docent/desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg"

@Docent wrote:

Driman Rune:

post the method for the grandExhange.cfg

Heres the entire class, it isnt big

[code=java]package palidino76.rs2.world;

import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class geLoader {
public int maxListedItems = 16000;

public String sell = “”;
public String buy = “”;
public geLoader() {
System.out.println("[Ge Prices loaded]");
try {
loadprices();
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}
public void loadprices() throws IOException {
String line = “”;
FileReader fr = new FileReader(“C:/Users/milaud/Desktop/Drowning508/Drowning508/bin/data/items/grandExchange.cfg”);
BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(fr);
String s= “”;
while ((s = br.readLine()) != null) {
String Read[] = s.split("\t");
if(Read[0].contains("["))
{
break;
}
String itemId = Read[0].substring(7);
if (Read[1].contains(“m”)) {
sell = Read[1].replace(“m”, “00000”);
} else if (Read[1].contains(“k”)) {
sell = Read[1].replace(“k”, “00”);
} else {
sell = Read[1].replace(",", “”);
}
if (Read[2].contains(“m”)) {
buy = Read[2].replace(“m”, “00000”);
} else if (Read[2].contains(“k”)) {
buy = Read[2].replace(“k”, “00”);
} else {
buy = Read[2].replace(",", “”);
}
sell = sell.replace(".", “”).replace(" “, “”);
buy = buy.replace(”.", “”).replace(" ", “”);

        if (sell.equals("null")) {
            sell = "0";
        }
        if (buy.equals("null")) {
            buy = "0";
        }
        newItemList(Integer.parseInt(itemId), Integer.parseInt(sell), Integer.parseInt(buy));
         }
    
}

private void newItemList(int ItemId, int buy, int sell) {
    if (ItemId > maxListedItems) {
        Misc.println("maxListedItems to low.");
        return;

    geList[ItemId] = new geList(ItemId, buy, sell);

}[/code]
